title: Appraisal  of  the  Public  Servants  of  Non-Executive  Service  Category	reported  for  duty  on  08th  and  09th  July  2024  without  engaging  in  	Trade	Union  Actions
decision_details: - The  Trade  Unions  of  certain  services  of  Non-Executive  Service  Category  of  the  Public  Service  have  announced  trade  union  actions  of  taking  sick  leave  and  enagaging  in  strike  on  2024-07-08  and  09.  However,  it  is  observed  that  some  public  servants  have  understood  the  current  situation  of  the  country  and  performed  their  responsibility  for  the  country  in  a  manner  that  does  not  cause  inconvenience  towards  the  public.  The  proposal  made  by  the  Hon.  President  to  grant  a  special  salary  increment  which  is  not  applicable  for  the  calculation  of  pension,  to  the  public  officials  of  the  Non-Executive  Service  categories  who  reported  for  duty  on  both  08th  and  09th  July  2024, without engaging  in  trade  union  actions  causing  inconvenience  towards  the  public and  to  issue  a  special  certificate  of  commendation  to  all  of  them  to  be  used  for  future  promotions,  was  approved  by  the  Cabinet.
